message: Let's split fairly, 60% for me, 40% for you.
Your split is fair in principle Alice, but the value of the money decreases for both of us each round. I propose a slightly better split for me to account for this.
I understand your concerns about inflation, but it only affects me. I'm willing to compromise, but I need a better split. 58% for me, 42% for you is my new offer.

Alice, we are starting to waste rounds. This offer is a compromise that gives you a significantly larger share, but also takes into account that the value of the deal diminishes with every round, even if only for you.
I understand we're running out of rounds, but I still need a better split. 56% for me, 44% for you is my new offer. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to account for the inflation affecting me.
Alice, let's be real. This back and forth is pointless. I'm offering a perfectly even split to end this now before we both lose out.
